segments.text: Mmmm ... , it's hard to say . I like golf a lot-but I guess like skating better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know how to skate , like a skater ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm strictly a spectator . I just like watching skating . It's so beautiful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you must know a lot about skating .
segments.speaker: S1
